titles.title: 1940 Takings Restoration Act
To restore to the original owners certain lands that the Federal Government took for military purposes in 1940.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/28/1999--Introduced. 1940 Takings Restoration Act - Directs the heads of executive agencies to restore to the original owners certain lands taken for military purposes in 1940.
